OHOS::TextFormatter¶

Overview¶

Related Modules:

Graphic

Description:

Defines a text formatter. You can inherit this class and implement the Format() function.

Since:

1.0

Version:

1.0

Description

Format (int16_t value, char *outText, uint16_t textLen)

virtual bool

Converts the input integer into a character string for output.
